description: Jockey Jack Kennedy will make his return to horse racing at Leopardstown after recovering from a broken leg.
title: Jack Kennedy to return at Leopardstown after broken leg
title_page: Jack Kennedy to return at Leopardstown after broken leg - BBC Sport
